reference.title: javaapi-domain module
reference.shortdesc: Provides the description of the elements that refer to the API items within Java API topics or other DITA topic types, such as concept or task.

refbody.section:
DescriptionThe javaapi-domain is a module that packages several elements, such as <javaoperation> or <javapackage> elements. These elements allow the writer a consistent way to provide references to other topic types operations or packages.
The javaapi-domain topic contains the following elements:
